column1: Daily Weather Observations for Alice Springs, Northern Territory for December 2024
Prepared at 13:03 UTC on Friday  8 August 2025   IDCJDW8002.202412
Observations taken at Alice Springs Airport.

The airport is about 11 kilometres from Alice Springs township. Some cloud observations are from automated equipment; these are somewhat different to those made by a human observer and may not appear every day.
Observations were drawn from Alice Springs Airport {station 015590}
